Package com.philips.platform.appinfra.abtestclient

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ABTestClientInterface
    The ABTest client Interface
    ABTestClientInterface.OnRefreshListener
    These tests will be refreshes if you update cache after app restart or update
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ABTestClientManager
    The ABTest Client Manager
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ABTestClientInterface.CACHESTATUSVALUES
    NO_TESTS_DEFINED: no list of tests is configured NO_CACHED_EXPERIENCES: tests are configured but no experience values are in cache EXPERIENCES_NOT_UPDATED: tests are configured, cached experience values are of previous app start EXPERIENCES_PARTIALLY_UPDATED: tests are configured, some experience values are updated from the server in this app start, others may still be from previous execution or not cached at all EXPERIENCES_UPDATED: tests are configured, all experience values have been downloaded from the server for this app start
    ABTestClientInterface.OnRefreshListener.ERRORVALUES  
    ABTestClientInterface.UPDATETYPES
    Update cache after app restart or update
